features.featureTitle: In `frontend/src/pages/PositionRecovery.tsx`, wire the Refresh button to a real async action that: (1) calls `getPositionRisk()` from `binanceAccountService.ts` to fetch live position data from `GET https://fapi.binance.com/fapi/v2/positionRisk`; (2) re-executes the `positionRecoveryEngine` logic against the freshly fetched positions to detect those with unrealized loss exceeding 20%; (3) updates the displayed list of deeply negative positions with the new results; and (4) shows a loading spinner or disabled state on the Refresh button while the operation is in progress, restoring to normal after completion or on error.
